description: Lists the service principal name that the connector uses to authenticate with Active Directory.

parameters.name: ConnectorArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateConnector.

parameters.name: DirectoryRegistrationArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateDirectoryRegistration.

nested_items.name: ServicePrincipalName
nested_items.description: The service principal name that the connector uses to authenticate with Active Directory.

nested_items.name: ConnectorArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateConnector.html.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the service principal name was created.

nested_items.name: DirectoryRegistrationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that was returned when you called CreateDirectoryRegistration.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a service principal name.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: Additional information for the status of a service principal name if the status is failed.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time that the service principal name was updated.
